pages.text: A variety of different stone walking surfaces can be applied over a base course, and all provide a 20% speed bonus. Cobbled roads are created by adding loose rocks over the base course. Sett roads can be constructed from stone or ceramic bricks.

pages.title: Flagstone Crafting
pages.text: Flagstones can be crafted from smooth stone or sandstone blocks.
